name: Grain
description: Basic grain harvested from village fields, essential food staple with steady demand.

name: Herbs
description: Medicinal herbs gathered from the forest, valued for healing and cooking applications.

name: Lumber
description: Quality lumber cut from thornwood forests, essential for construction and crafting.

name: Fish
description: Fresh fish caught from local rivers, prized for their quality and freshness.

name: Pottery
description: Handcrafted pottery made from local clay, functional and decorative household items.

name: Cloth
description: Woven cloth made from local fibers, essential for clothing and household goods.

name: Climbing Gear
description: Essential climbing equipment including rope and harness, enables access to mountain routes.

name: Navigation Tools
description: Compass and charts for wilderness navigation, prevents getting lost in forest routes.

name: Trade Tools
description: Specialized tools for workshop access and craft contracts, enables professional opportunities.
